content.prompt_es: Introducción al repaso final del nivel A2.
content.tts_en: Welcome to your final review! Today we will practice everything we have learned: adjectives, adverbs, connectors, and common mistakes. Good luck!

content.prompt_es: Relaciona cada conector con su significado o equivalente en español.
Elige la forma correcta (Adjetivo o Adverbio).
content.stimulus_en: She is a ________ (perfect) writer. She writes in ________ (perfect) English and she speaks very ________ (good).

content.prompt_es: Clasifica los adjetivos según describan un sentimiento (-ed) o una cualidad (-ing).
Indica si las siguientes frases son correctas (True) o incorrectas (False).
content.stimulus_en:
1. I have three childrens. 
2. My mother didn't allow me go out. 
3. Is he old enough to drive?
content.stimulus_es: Considera los errores comunes: plurales irregulares y verb patterns.

content.prompt_es: Elige la preposición correcta para el superlativo.
content.stimulus_en: He is the tallest boy ________ his class.

content.prompt_es: Escribe la frase que escuchas prestando atención a la posición del adverbio.
content.tts_en: My grandmother is always at home in the evening.
content.correct_answer: My grandmother is always at home in the evening

content.prompt_es: Ordena la pregunta usando el superlativo y el presente perfecto.
Describe tus vacaciones ideales usando al menos dos adjetivos, un adverbio y un conector.
content.instruction_en: Write 30-50 words about your ideal holiday. Use adjectives, adverbs, and connectors like 'while' or 'since'.

content.prompt_es: Habla sobre algo que hagas 'every day' o 'once a week'.
content.stimulus_en: I go to the gym every day and I study English twice a week.
